ContentStructure.title: What animal would you like to be
Would you be living in San Francisco

1.  A:                                                                       if you could afford it? B: Yes, I would be living in San Francisco. (If I could afford it, I'd be living in San Francisco.)   2.  A:                                                                      if you had billions of dollars? B: Yes, I would help the poor.  (If I had billions of dollars, I would help the poor.)   3.  A:                                                                       if you were an animal? B: I would like to be a koala bear.  (I would like to be a koala bear)   4.  A:                                                                       if she had a place to stay? B: Yes, she would go to Thailand . (She would go to Thailand if she had a place to stay.)   5.  A:                                                                      if you saw a student cheating on an exam? B: No, I wouldn't tell the teacher. (I wouldn't tell the teacher if I saw a student cheating.)   6.  A:                                                                       if he could go anywhere in the world? B: He would go to Hawaii.  (He would go to Hawaii if he could go anywhere in the world.)									        	              7.  A:                                                                       if you won ten million Euros? B: I don't know what I would do. (I don't know what I would do if I won ten million Euros.)  8. A: What time are we having dinner? B: We haven't planned a specific time. We will probably eat                                                                                                                                                                                 8:00 or 8:30.
